attributes.action: Counter petition to the petition titled "One Day Holiday On Birth of Prophet Muhammad"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Britain is not a Muslim country and we don't even have a national holiday for St George, so to call for a national holiday to celebrate the birth of Muhammad is crazy.

This petition is a counter petition for the one raised (to have a national holiday for Mohammad).

The prime minister should reject any calls for a national holiday [for Muhammad].

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
